data.text: I booked this stay through Expedia and their website said they had air conditioning but when I arrived, the room was very very very hot and I asked and they said during this time of year we don't have air-conditioning we only have heat and I called Expedia and ask for a refund so I could move somewhere that had air conditioning and Expedia said there was nothing they could do and they were very sorry
data.title: Very bad area very very noisy and no air conditioning. I would never stay here again and I would not recommend this for

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear guest, our hotel has air conditioning, we arranged the central system as you wish, you thanked everyone individually, stating that you were very satisfied.
You stated that you were very pleased with the hotel.
I don't know what the problem is and
The stay was great for you.
This article made us sad. We would be happy to welcome you again and offer our respects.
owner_response.author: EMEN'S HOTEL

data.text: We found everything we needed, at a very reasonable rate, at Emen's Hotel - it became our base for exploring Izmir and going to Ephesus. The hotel is centrally located - very clean and well organized, excellent staff who speak English and are extremely helpful. The rooms are very well equipped, very clean, good bed, shower and facilities. And the breakfast buffet and café lattes was a great way to start the day.
data.title: A perfect stay in Izmir

data.text:
Firstly I'll say that the hotel is very clean, modern, and looks newly refurbished. The staff were all very helpful and fantastic.
However, they have 3 birds (including a parrot) which they keep locked up in tiny cages which was quite upsetting! And also, completely unnecessary!! Having pet birds doesn't add any value to a hotel. Parrots are very intelligent animals and it is cruel to keep them locked in such a small space.
The location of the hotel is in a very dodgey part of Izmir! It felt quite unsafe leaving the hotel at night time. There are no nice restaurants or cafes within close walking distance. If I ever come back to Izmir I would prefer to be staying near the water/pier as that is where all the nice places are. The rooms were also tiny, and the wifi doesn't work very well. The staff were very helpful on the last day when my dad got sick with pneumonia - they helped him find a doctor to see, and allowed us to have a late check out that day so we had enough time to go to the doctor and come back! So we were very grateful for that! Staff were also very helpful with organising a tour to Ephesus and back aswell.
data.title: Great hotel, in a not-so-great location, and they keep animals locked up in tiny cages

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest, we would like to state that we were very pleased to meet you and host you in our hotel.

Thank you very much for your positive comments about your stay at Emens Hotel. We would like to state that we have shared your positive comments with our team. We are happy to hear that you were satisfied with your stay.

We thank you again for your interest and valuable time, and we hope to host you again in our hotel as soon as possible for a perfect experience.

HOTEL MANAGER
YELİZ YÖZ
owner_response.author: EMEN'S HOTEL

data.text: I was recently a guest at emen's hotel for 3 nights. I don't usually write reviews, but this time it's worth it. The friendliness of the staff, the excellent breakfast, the cleanliness of the rooms and the rooms make me recommend anyone to stay in this hotel, located very close to the center of Izmir. on the last day before the restart I forgot some t-shirts and they are doing their utmost to send them to me in Italy. Highly recommended
data.title: Best hotel in Izmir

data.text: First of all, I want to thank with all my honor and respect Tuğçe Şahin, the pulsating engine of the hotel. Her eyes are always ready for each and everyone. Two tours were scheduled in Efes and Pamukkale and she organized at the really top level. The hotel has everything you need. And the staff? Kind, helpful, friendly, high professional, 24-hours to assist all of us, courtesy, respect and smile always make me happy and at home. Cleanliness, elegance and courtesy are always facing you. For me, best hotel in Izmir. See you soon, perfect staff. Thank you very much Ms Tuğçe Şahin.
data.title: Emen’s Hotel: İzmir, Turkey: 100 % guaranteed
